title: Natural Bridges National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Road Construction - Expect Delays  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Road Construction - Expect Delays  Road crews will be working on park roads Sept. 1, 2, 6, and 7. Expect 15-minute delays on the entrance road and 45-minute delays on Bridge View Drive. You will have access to a limited number of trailheads and overlooks. Schedule is subject to change.
